tag_list: mobile, expert, mobile-marketing, mobile-apps-development, ios, android, apps, mobile-apps
overview:
Yeeply is the world’s first outsourcing marketplace for mobile solutions, where expert freelancers and companies meet and can get their mobile projects done.

Customers from all around the worlds publish their projects and get offers from mobile and marketing experts usings Yeeply’s internal credits.

Experts from all around the world can register and get customers using credits. They can be hired if customers accept their offers.

Both customers and experts may get credits using Paypal. They can also get FREE credits inviting their coleagues, and even they can get extra money by getting commissions from their payments in the website.
